Kyujin

Korean: 규진

Hometown:

Bundang-gu, Seongnam, Gyeonggi-do

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Jang Kyu-jin
Native name:
장규진
Birthday:
May 26, 2006
Age:
18 years old
Blood type:
A
Height:
5'5" (164 cm)
Group (2022-present):
NMIXX

Introduction

Jang Kyujin is a South Korean dancer, rapper and singer under JYP Entertainment. She is the main dancer of the girl group
NMIXX.

She debuted as a member of the girl group NMIXX on February 22, 2022, with their debut album "AD MARE".

JYP Entertainment:
